column4: ha... I have just been out for half an hour and this install has moved 1%
is there a way I can cancel the install and then check the integrity of the sata drive I am trying to install onto?
what are you trying to do ? upgrade to edgy ?  it takes a long time , just go and have a long nap
fresh install of dapper on another drive
I have never had long install times before
dunno if it is the drive or the cd that might be causing the probs
if there is nothing else on there you need to save just pull the plug
I am in live cd installing just now
dont need to save the drive has been wiped and partitioned
just taking ages to install to iy
is there a command to check the drives integrity from a live cd?
it shouldn'T take so long, something is off,  kill it , verify stuff, and start again
what did you mean by verify stuff?
didn'T you want to check the hdd's integrety and stuff ?
yes but how is what I want to know
